TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SdcaNonCalibratedBinaryTrainer extends Microsoft.ML.Trainers.SdcaBinaryTrainerBase`1<class Microsoft.ML.Trainers.LinearBinaryModelParameters>
Public NotInheritable Class SdcaNonCalibratedBinaryTrainer Inherits SdcaBinaryTrainerBase(Of LinearBinaryModelParameters)

Docs.summary: The for training a binary logistic regression classification model using the stochastic dual coordinate ascent method.

remarks.format:
To create this trainer, use [SdcaNonCalibrated](xref:Microsoft.ML.StandardTrainersCatalog.SdcaNonCalibrated(Microsoft.ML.BinaryClassificationCatalog.BinaryClassificationTrainers,System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.ML.Trainers.ISupportSdcaClassificationLoss,System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Int32})) or [SdcaNonCalibrated(Options)](xref:Microsoft.ML.StandardTrainersCatalog.SdcaNonCalibrated(Microsoft.ML.BinaryClassificationCatalog.BinaryClassificationTrainers,Microsoft.ML.Trainers.SdcaNonCalibratedBinaryTrainer.Options)).

### Trainer Characteristics | | | | -- | -- | | Machine learning task | Binary classification | | Is normalization required? | Yes | | Is caching required? | No | | Required NuGet in addition to Microsoft.ML | None |
